name: Audio Selector
description: Allows you to change the audio output device for tabs.

select-audio-device.description: Change the audio output device for the current tab

meet-switch-tab.description: Switch to the next google meet tab

meet-join.description: Join the meeting if only one tab is open and switch to it

meet-toggle-microphone.description: Mute/Unmute the microphone for the active google meet tab (without switching)

meet-toggle-camera.description: Mute/Unmute the camera for the active google meet tab (without switching)
